metadata.title: CVE-2023-39562 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC v2.3-DEV-rev449-g5948e4f70-master was discovered to contain aheap-use-after-free via the gf_bs_align function at bitstream.c. Thisvulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) viasupplying a crafted file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
